content: I'm glad to hear that HelloFresh offers flexibility with their subscription model. I think I'll give their service a try and see how it works out for me. I'll make sure to review their menu and ingredients carefully to ensure they can accommodate my lactose intolerance and dislike of beef. If I have any issues or need to pause or cancel my subscription, I know I can reach out to their customer service team for assistance. Thanks for the helpful info!
